gameDetails.name: Terra Mystica: Shipping Value promo card
gameDetails.description:
This Bonus card for Shipping value rewards navigation at the end of the round. It provides 3 Power during income, and when you pass with this Bonus card, you get a number of Victory points equal to your Shipping value multiplied by 3.

It was available as part of Spielbox Magazine issue 6/2013 and was sold in the BoardGameGeek.com store. It was rereleased in Terra Mystica: Erweiterungsbogen, a promotional mini-expansion released at Spiel 2015.
